text: @Mike_Pence @SecretaryCarson @JohnCornyn @robertjeffress The fact that Pence is obviously acting on @realDonaldTrump orders to act as though all is normal in Texas, which, thanks to trmp/Pence's incompetence, is a #coronavirus hotspot, is criminal!
